nodes.text: Gallofree Aerial Products was a company that produced the MSP80 Pteropter hover pod. The pods were designed for use in mining, but also saw use by Trandoshan hunters and the Pyke Syndicate during the Clone Wars.

Gallofree Aerial Products was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2018 reference book Star Wars Encyclopedia of Starfighters and Other Vehicles, which was written by Landry Q. Walker. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 2011 reference book Star Wars: The Clone Wars: Incredible Vehicles, which was written by Jason Fry.
